title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value so that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Ensure that the key in the properties file is left blank but still has a valid value.
